tutorial: Testing a Trading Idea - The Other Stages
type: Tutorial Step - It's All About References!

definition.text: Do you know what references are and how to establish them? If not, read this page in the docs!

paragraphs.text: References are a crucial concept in Superalgos, as they relate information across nodes and hierarchies!
You must establish a reference from the Market Sell Order node in the trading system to this Market Sell Order #1 Market Order node in the trading engine hierarchy! Go ahead! Do it!
I'll give you a couple of tips on the next step if you are not sure how to go about this!
